R

rand - Variable in class gameobjects.Enemy
 
reachedTheGround() - Method in class gameobjects.EnemyGroup
determines if EnemyWave reached the ground
refreshFrame() - Method in class gameboards.Board
refreshes frame checks if there game has already ended and if so calls gameManager.renderAfterGame(int score) method with gained score if players state is set to "dying" then decrement lives variable and revive the player if game still continues then moves with every movable game object resolve collisions between game objects
registerKeys() - Method in class gameboards.Board
registers keys and their actions using Action API
renderAfterGame(int) - Method in class controllers.GameManager
renders afterGame panel where user is able to submit his score and alias to the database
renderPanelAndDisableRest(JPanel) - Method in class controllers.GameManager
renders given panel and disables all the rest
resetAfterGame() - Method in class controllers.GameManager
resetting afterGame panel's initial values
resolveCollisions() - Method in class gameboards.Board
resolving collisions - player shot and enemies - enemy shots and player - both player/enemy shot and obstacles
Results - Variable in class controllers.GameManager
 
resultsButton - Variable in class controllers.GameManager
 
resultsTable - Variable in class controllers.GameManager
 
revive() - Method in class gameobjects.Player
makes player live again reloads players sprite and centers his position
run() - Method in class gameboards.Board
basic game loop mechanism (refreshes after FRAME_REFRESH_TIME)
